All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Book
This class will represent a book and store information such as title, author, genre, price, and availability
Customer
This class will store customer information, including name, phone number, and address.
Inventory
This class will manage the inventory of books in the online bookstore.
ObmsTester
Class to test the OnlineBookstoreManagementSystem class
OnlineBookstoreManagementSystem
This class represents the system with interface methods to register customers, add books to inventory, browse inventory, place order, and print invoice
Order
This class will handle the process of placing orders.
Payment
This class will handle the payment process, integrating with a payment gateway to process credit cards or other payment methods.
ShoppingCart
This class represents a customer's shopping cart
